body.name: Canon PIXMA TR4720 Wireless Color All-in-One Inkjet Printer, Black - Print Copy Scan Fax - 4800 x 1200 dpi, Auto 2-Side Printing, 20-Sheet ADF, Tillsiy Printer_Cable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 15 - 20. Order within 11 hrs 39 mins.
features: PRINT, COPY, SCAN, FAX: The PIXMA TR4720 is a true 4-in-1 printer that is compact, versatile and easy-to-use. EASY SETUP: Enjoy simple setup through the Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app. EASY TO INSTALL: Designed for easy ink cartridge installation and replacement. FRONT PAPER TRAY: A fast and easy to load front paper tray with 100 sheet plain paper capacity.

FRONT PAPER TRAY: A fast and easy to load front paper tray with 100-sheet plain paper capacity reduces the need to refill paper as frequently. DESIGNED FOR YOUR SPACE: PIXMA TR4720 has a compact design, available in black or white, to fit your space at the office or at home.

EFFICIENT DOCUMENT PRINTING & SCANNING: Scan up to Legal size multi-page documents efficiently with the Auto Document Feeder. And save up to 50% of your paper costs with Auto 2-Sided (Duplex) Printing for Letter size documents. QUALITY DOCUMENTS & PHOTOS: The PIXMA TR4720 utilizes a hybrid ink system with pigment-based black and dye-based color for sharp black text and vivid color prints. Product quality documents, photos, and also borderless11 prints up to 8.5" x 11".

SIMPLE PRINTER INTERFACE: With the 2-Line LCD display and simple buttons, easily adjust printer settings, make copies, and send faxes with the number pad. Receive a Document Removal Reminder on the display if you forget your original document on the scanner.
In the Box: PIXMA TR4720 Wireless All-in-One Printer; Set of Starter (PG-275/CL-276) Ink Cartridges; RJ-11 Telephone/Modem Cable; Power Cord; Documentation. Bundled with Tillsiy Printer_Cable.
body.description: PIXMA TR4720 Wireless All-in-One PrinterFor all your work or home printing needs, the PIXMA TR4720 Wireless All-in-One Printer has you covered. Big on performance, the PIXMA TR4720 is a true 4-in-1 with the ability to print, copy, scan, and fax. With a variety of connectivity options, you'll be able to do it all from your PC or mobile devices— plus, the PIXMA TR4720 is compatible with Canon apps for printing, scanning, creative projects and more. Simple, productive office and home printing in a compact size— that’s the PIXMA TR4720.All-in-one printer provides printing, copying, scanning, and fax capabilities in one compact machineInkjet printing ensures detailed, high-quality printsCapable of auto two-sided (duplex) printing for letter-size documentsEasily print from any room with built-in wireless 802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz connectivityDimensions: 7.5"H x 17.2"W x 11.7"DFeatures a 100-sheet input capacity; auto document feeder efficiently scans multipage documents up to legal sizeHybrid ink system produces both sharp black text and colorful printsEquipped with a two-line LCD and simple buttonsMeets or exceeds ENERGY STAR standardCanon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app allows for simple initial setup, printing, and scanning right from your smartphone or tabletEnjoy print speeds of approximately 8.8 images per minute (black)/4.4 images per minute (color)Print borderless photos from 4" x 6" to 8.5" x 11"With auto power on/off, the printer will automatically turn on when you need it and off when you don'tDocument removal reminder will let you know when you've left an original document on the scanner platenPackage contents: all-in-one printer, starter black ink cartridge (PG-275), starter color ink cartridge (CL-276), power cord, RJ11 telephone/modem cable, and documentation
